    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteButtonOnClick(android.view.View view)
      deleteButtonOnClick in the activity_view_taskxml, when the delete button is pressed prompt user with a confirmation dialog.
      void editButtonOnClick(android.view.View view)
      editButtonOnClick in the activity_view_taskxml, when the edit button is pressed got to the edit task activity upon confirmation call vieTaskController to edit the task through elastic search
      void findViews()
      findViews assign variables to their respective views upon init
      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      onActivityResult upon return from EditTaskActivity update the details of teh task and call viewTaskController to update the details of the task also update the activity_profile.xml to reflect the changes in the task
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      onCreate Retrieve the task using the task id that was sent using intent into the activity updating the information on the activity_ViewTaskActivity while checking if the task has a provider, what the status is and if the user viewing is the owner of the task
      void onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
      Add a marker with the location of the task on the map fragment If map is clicked, switch to MapActivity
      void providerPictureOnClick(android.view.View view)
      ProviderPictureOnClick when providerpicture clicked in activity_view_task.xml pass user id through intent and start the ProfileActivity
      void requesterPictureOnClick(android.view.View view)
      RequesterPictureOnClick when requester picture clicked in activity_view_task.xml pass user id through intent and start the ProfileActivity
      void setProviderField()
      setPoviderField sets the provider text and picture accordingly if the task status is bidded then the best bidder will appear on the field else if the task status is assigned or completed then the provider will appear
      void setRequesterField()
      setRequesterField sets the text and picture in the requester field
      void setUpBidsList()
      setUpBidsList get all of this task's bids and pass it into expandable list to display
      void setValues()
      setValues set the values of the respective variables upon init
      void setVisibility()
      setVisibility sets the visibilities of every button according to the task status and viewer upon init
      void theBlueButton(android.view.View view) 
      void theGreenButton(android.view.View view)
      theGreenButton when the task is assigned there will be a green button where the requester is able to complete the task
      void theOrangeButton(android.view.View view)
      theOrangeButton upon completing a task, a orange button appears which enables the requester/provider to review the other user goes to another activity to write a review
      void thePinkButton(android.view.View view)
      thePinkButton when the task is requested or bidded there will be a pink button where the requester can decline one of the existing bids onclick it shows a dialog with a listview of existing bids and a button to confirm declination
      void theRedButton(android.view.View view)
      theRedButton when the task is assigned there will be a red button where the requester is able to unassign the provider from the task and reset the task back to requested with no bids
      void theYellowButton(android.view.View view)
      theYellowButton when the task is bidded or requested the requester can accept an existing bid from the list of existing bids onclick a dialog shows up with a list view of existing bids and a button to confirm acceptance
      java.lang.Integer updateBestBid(java.lang.Float incomingBidFloat)
      updateBestBid updates best bidder field if new bid has value less than the current best bid
      void updateBidsList()
      updateBidsList updates bbids list view upon call

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        onCreate Retrieve the task using the task id that was sent using intent into the activity updating the information on the activity_ViewTaskActivity while checking if the task has a provider, what the status is and if the user viewing is the owner of the task

        savedInstanceState -

      • deleteButtonOnClick

        public void deleteButtonOnClick(android.view.View view)
        deleteButtonOnClick in the activity_view_taskxml, when the delete button is pressed prompt user with a confirmation dialog. upon confirmation call vieTaskController to remove the task through elastic search

      • editButtonOnClick

        public void editButtonOnClick(android.view.View view)
        editButtonOnClick in the activity_view_taskxml, when the edit button is pressed got to the edit task activity upon confirmation call vieTaskController to edit the task through elastic search

        public void thePinkButton(android.view.View view)

        Parameters:

        public void theOrangeButton(android.view.View view)

      • updateBestBid

        public java.lang.Integer updateBestBid(java.lang.Float incomingBidFloat)
        updateBestBid updates best bidder field if new bid has value less than the current best bid
        Parameters:
        incomingBidFloat - the bid amount the new bid will be
        Returns:
        0 if best bidder needs update, -1 if not
